faq.question: Can I switch plans anytime?
faq.answer: Yes. Upgrade or downgrade from your dashboard instantly. Changes prorate to the day — you only pay for what you use.

faq.question: What happens after the trial?
faq.answer: Your projects stay live. After 14 days, pick a plan to keep going. No data deleted, no pressure tactics.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer: 30-day money-back guarantee on all plans. If DC doesn’t deliver, you get a full refund. No questions asked.

faq.question: Is there a discount for annual billing?
faq.answer: Yes — save 20% when you pay annually. That’s 2.4 months free on every plan.
